title: Network computers and cards - duagon
content: We are the leader in the field of communication and control solutions for the rolling stock market. In the area of communication, we offer solutions for train networks using MVB, WTB, Ethernet and CAN. We offer a wide range of communication interfaces with different protocols, form factors and host interfaces to allow our customer to focus on their solutions. The supported form factos include PC/104, CompactPCI, PCIexpress Mini Card and more.

Our MVB products comply with IEC 61375-3-1 and support devices up to Class 4. The offering can be adjusted to customer needs and includes Process Data, Message Data and Bus Administrator capabilities. Our devices support both ESD+ and EMD physical layer.

duagon has been leading with its Ethernet development and offers support for all commonly used real-time Ethernet protocols including EtherNet/IP - CIP, IPTCom, TRDP and PROFINET. Additionally, our interfaces offer features such as webserver, FTP, remote firmware update and more.

The broad product offering of communication interfaces is supplemented by an extensive selection of gateways, allowing the inter-connection of different communication technologies, for example MVB to Ethernet.
Safe and secure data transfer on customizable platforms
Link, connect or extend existing networks
Connect devices, route data and manage ports and security
The in-house control of all IP minimized the risk of obsolescence and avoids dependencies on third-party license costs and restrictions.
